game.name: Call of Duty®: Warzone™
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Captions available, In-App Purchases
game.shortDescription: 콜 오브 듀티®: 워존에 오신 것을 환영합니다. 대규모 무료 전투 아레나인 베르단스크와 리버스 아일랜드에서 짜릿한 모드와 새로운 게임플레이 기능을 경험해보십시오.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to Call of Duty®: Warzone™, the massive free-to-play combat arena. Experience thrilling modes & new gameplay features in Verdansk and Rebirth Island.
game.developers: Infinity Ward, Raven Software, Beenox, Treyarch, High Moon Studios, Sledgehammer Games, Activision Shanghai, Demonware, Toys for Bob

reviewHighlights.text: having to download a whole launcher and then the actual warzone is the dumbest thing to exist i just want warzone bro not the whole franchise
WASTE OF TIME, DATA & RESOURCES This game is a huge disappointment and a complete waste of time and internet data. According to the official recommend...
